markdown:
­

BridgeWorkSLED - BridgeWork Partners

[Open sliding top](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/services/bridgeworksled/#)

## BridgeWorkSLED

Through the growth of our company, we are officially adding “BridgeWorkSLED,” to our service offerings. With over 90,000 different government organizations, the State, Local & Education (SLED) market, is incredibly important to the overall landscape of our country and to BridgeWork Partners! We are passionate and have years of experience working with and supporting a number of these organizations, but we are excited to officially add this to our business offerings.

![SLED](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/SLED-800x562.png)

## Our Experience

## State & Local Government

#### [Temp-to-Hire Staffing](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/services/bridgeworksled/\#1667414488006-4e6567a1-ac20)

We have placed people in the following positions:

- Customer Service Reps
- Administrative Assistants
- Buyers
- Accounts Receivable
- Accounts Payable
- Management Analyst
- Payroll Support
- Quality Improvement Specialist
- Service Tech
- Workforce Analyst
- Public Communicator
- HRIS Business Planner
- HRIS Analyst
- Public Safety Communicator
- HR Recruiters
- Safety Operations Call Center
- IT Auditor
- Sr. Internal Auditor
- Desktop Support
- Paralegal
- Clerk
- Data Entry

#### [Direct Hire Placement](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/services/bridgeworksled/\#1667414488027-88d64461-9526)

Sample of positions we have hired for:

- Executive Director
- Managing Director
- Assistant Director of Traffic Incident & Management
- Sr Communications Strategist
- Public Relations Manager
- Traffic Engineer
- Assistant Traffic Engineer
- Sr. Procurement Specialist
- Construction Engineering Manager

## K-12

#### [Temporary Recruiting](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/services/bridgeworksled/\#1667414267025-6be85c7c-16f6)

We have placed people in the following positions:

- Clerical & Administrative
- Data Entry
- HR Benefits Specialist
- IT Data Cabling Tech
- Telecom Installation Tech
- Bilingual Receptionists
- Accounts Payable
- IT Service Desk
- Customer Service
- Inventory Clerk
- Paralegal
- Fingerprinting Tech
- Budget Specialist

## Higher Education

#### [HR Projects](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/services/bridgeworksled/\#1667413674440-125cec9c-3e8b)

- Learning and Development Strategy Consulting
- Leadership Development and Coaching
- Job Description Writing
- Job Description Research and Role Evaluations
- Salary Survey and Market Research
- Talent Pool Administration
- Employee Relations

#### [Direct Hire Placement](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/services/bridgeworksled/\#1667413578333-e3ee981b-d956)

Sample of positions we have recruited for:

- Directors
- Sr. Directors
- Associate Deans
- Talent Acquisitions
- Human Resources Employee Relations
- Performance Management Consultant
- Title IX
- Sr. Director of Diversity

#### [Executive Search](https://bridgeworkpartners.com/services/bridgeworksled/\#1667413918472-e1e0ba5c-d5b5)

Sample of the executive searches we have assisted with:

- Associate Deans
- Chief Marketing Officer
- Chief Legislative Counsel
- Chief Social Responsibility & Inclusion Officer
- Associate Vice Chancellor Business Innovation

Vice Provosts for:

- Educational Partnerships
- Law
- Creative Arts, Entertainment and Design
- Health Sciences

## Client Testimonials

SLED Testimonials

html:
­
BridgeWorkSLED - BridgeWork Partners

BridgeWorkSLED

Through the growth of our company, we are officially adding “BridgeWorkSLED,” to our service offerings. With over 90,000 different government organizations, the State, Local & Education (SLED) market, is incredibly important to the overall landscape of our country and to BridgeWork Partners! We are passionate and have years of experience working with and supporting a number of these organizations, but we are excited to officially add this to our business offerings.

Our Experience

State & Local Government

Temp-to-Hire Staffing

We have placed people in the following positions:

  • Customer Service Reps
  • Administrative Assistants
  • Buyers
  • Accounts Receivable
  • Accounts Payable
  • Management Analyst
  • Payroll Support
  • Quality Improvement Specialist
  • Service Tech
  • Workforce Analyst
  • Public Communicator
  • HRIS Business Planner
  • HRIS Analyst
  • Public Safety Communicator
  • HR Recruiters
  • Safety Operations Call Center
  • IT Auditor
  • Sr. Internal Auditor
  • Desktop Support
  • Paralegal
  • Clerk
  • Data Entry

Direct Hire Placement

Sample of positions we have hired for:

  • Executive Director
  • Managing Director
  • Assistant Director of Traffic Incident & Management
  • Sr Communications Strategist
  • Public Relations Manager
  • Traffic Engineer
  • Assistant Traffic Engineer
  • Sr. Procurement Specialist
  • Construction Engineering Manager

K-12

Temporary Recruiting

We have placed people in the following positions:

  • Clerical & Administrative
  • Data Entry
  • HR Benefits Specialist
  • IT Data Cabling Tech
  • Telecom Installation Tech
  • Bilingual Receptionists
  • Accounts Payable
  • IT Service Desk
  • Customer Service
  • Inventory Clerk
  • Paralegal
  • Fingerprinting Tech
  • Budget Specialist

Higher Education

HR Projects

  • Learning and Development Strategy Consulting
  • Leadership Development and Coaching
  • Job Description Writing
  • Job Description Research and Role Evaluations
  • Salary Survey and Market Research
  • Talent Pool Administration
  • Employee Relations

Direct Hire Placement

Sample of positions we have recruited for:

  • Directors
  • Sr. Directors
  • Associate Deans
  • Talent Acquisitions
  • Human Resources Employee Relations
  • Performance Management Consultant
  • Title IX
  • Sr. Director of Diversity

Executive Search

Sample of the executive searches we have assisted with:

    • Associate Deans
    • Chief Marketing Officer
    • Chief Legislative Counsel
    • Chief Social Responsibility & Inclusion Officer
    • Associate Vice Chancellor Business Innovation

Vice Provosts for:

  • Educational Partnerships
  • Law
  • Creative Arts, Entertainment and Design
  • Health Sciences

Client Testimonials
